H1: Short Bio
H1: Research assistant, PhD, and postdoctoral opportunities at PolyU
I'm currently looking for exceptional students interested in applying for the Hong Kong PhD Fellowship Scheme under my supervision. The deadline for applications is the 1st of December 2024, asap so that I can help you to shape a strong research proposal for your application. More info can be found at . Students interested in PolyU's , visiting researchers, and research assistant are also welcome to .

name: ROSSI_Luca
content:
H1: News & Upcoming Events
• I will be chairingS+SSPR 2024in Venice (Italy) on 9-10 September 2024.
• GraFix: A Graph Transformer with Fixed Attention based on the WL Kernelhas been accepted toICPR 2024.
• Graph Kernel Neural Networkshas been accepted for publication on the joiurnalIEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems.
• Graph neural networks in vision-language image understanding: a surveyhas been accepted for publication on the journalThe Visual Computer.
